qas.question: What body handles waste management in Plymouth?
In what year did Langage Power Station come on line?
What settlement is Langage Power Station located near?

context: <a0_0>Plymouth City Council<a0_0/> is responsible for waste management throughout the city and <a1_0>South West Water<a1_0/> is responsible for sewerage. Plymouth's electricity is supplied from the National Grid and distributed to Plymouth via <a2_0>Western Power Distribution<a2_0/>. On the outskirts of <a4_0>Plympton<a4_0/> a combined cycle gas-powered station, the Langage Power Station, which started to produce electricity for Plymouth at the end of <a3_0>2009<a3_0/>.
